name: Anomaly 1729
description: Come explore the world of Phiohm, where up can be down, left can be right, and the way forward is never what it seems. Guide newly cognizant Ano on a journey of self-discovery by learning how to manipulate this ever-changing world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 Compatible card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 Compatible card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Mind twisting game in which you need to navigate through enviroment where there is no up or down. And it looks gorgeous.
An awesome puzzle game, great graphics and intriguing mechanics.
